donor_name:
UNITED NATIONS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC &
CULTURAL ORGANIZAITON
MINISTRY OF ECONOMY,LABOUR AND ENTERPRENURSHIP OF REPUBLIC OF CROATIA
PROTECTION AND ENERGY EFFICIENCY FUND OF REPUBLIC OF CROATIA
outputs.output_descr: The EE Project aims at removing barriers for the implementation of economically feasible, energy efficient technologies and measures in residential and public sectors in Croatia, with the final goal to reduce energy consumption and the associated greenhouse gases, and rising public awareness about efficient use of energy. Important role of the Project is directed to strenghtening public service sector capacities (at cities, counties and central-government level) to systematically manage energy consumption in buildings, to identify and implement energy efficiency measures with the final result in reduced costs for energy, energy consumption and GHG emissions.

donor_name: UNIVERSITY OF ZAGREB FACULTY OF ELECTRICAL ENG
outputs.output_descr: Institutional support provided to ensure higher technical capacities for low-carbon and climate resilient development of Croatia. Support will be provided through partnership projects between public sector, experts, scientific communitiy, NGOs and private sector, at both national and regional level.

project_descr: PIMS 715 CC: FSP "Croatia - Removing Barriers to Improving Energy Efficiency of the Residental and Service Sectors"
project_title: Energy Efficiency in Public and Residential Buildings
